content.text:
# Ye Hai Swarg Hamara

Ye Hai Swarg Hamara is a 2025 Bhojpuri-language film directed and produced by Murali Lalwani and starring Kunal Singh in the lead role.
Cast
* Krunal Singh
* Raj Yadav
* Vimal Pandey
* Saurabh Sharma
* Rupa Mishra
* Umesh Singh
* Riddhima Singh
* Raja Bhojpuriya
* Kumar Pritam
* Vicky Badshah
* Arjun Singh
* Anu Maurya
* Sony Shukla
* Seema Gupata
Plot
Rams mother dies in childhood, father Dayanand marries Kamala for the second time, Kamala also dies after giving birth to two children Mohan and Sohan, Dayanand also dies after a few days, Ram brings up both the children with full responsibility.
Soundtrack
* "Ye Hai Swarg Hamara" by Shilpi Raj, Raja Bhojpuriya
Release
The film released on August 30 2025 in theatres.
References
